.. _sw_plotting:

Plotting
========
This module contains functions that help visualize the scenewalk model.

Example: Dynamic Visualization
==============================
.. image:: demo/extended_sw.mp4
        :width: 500

.. toctree::
        :caption: Dynamic plotting Notebook
        :maxdepth: 1   

        demo/dynamic_plot
